New Records: CJ McCollum tied a career-high with 50 points in just 30 minutes of play, tying an NBA record for 50 or more points and 10+ three-pointers in less than 35 minutes, joining Steph Curry and Klay Thompson to accomplish that.
Key Match Events: The New Orleans Pelicans ended their 11-game losing streak with a 132-120 victory over the Washington Wizards.
CJ McCollum scored 50 points in the game.
Officials replayed a three-pointer late in the fourth quarter and awarded McCollum a two, leaving him a point shy of setting the record.
Post-Match Reflections: CJ McCollum reflected on his career night and the effort it took to get the Pelicans the victory.
McCollum expressed the sacrifices he makes, including missing time with his family, to achieve success.
McCollum acknowledged the season has not gone as expected but emphasized his commitment to leadership and hard work.
